name: Daniil Yarancev
bio: I'm a student who loves to use Nim. It is a very unique and powerful language which contains a lot of features. Sometimes you can even forget that you're writing in a compiled language rather than in a scripting one!

name: Josh Goebel
bio: I mostly write Ruby on Rails professionally but for fun (and possibly profit one day) I dabble with Elixir, Nim, Arduino, and such. Iâ€™m really digging both Nim and Vim lately.
